page.title: 16THE PEOPLE OF PETT LEVEL III
page.content:
3. What living here means to a{farmer, whose family came to the farm where he lives now, in 1888. "There are two particular places on this farm where I can stand, look at the view and the land (not quite the same thing to a farmer) for a long time, and come away feeling much more at peace". He then asked me to quote from Rudyard Kipling:- "God gives all men all earth to love But since man's heart is small Ordains for each one spot shall prove Beloved over all!
Each to his choice and I rejoice The lot has fallen to me In a fairground - in a faifground Yes - Sussex by the sea".
